Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-27318 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.0.0-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-27318 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.0.0-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package pytorch is earlier than 2.0.0-6, affected by CVE-2024-27318
